name: Funny Wall PC
description:
Hi !
Funny Wall is a physics-based puzzle game with a mix of platformer, this is my first project, a challenge I started a few years ago, beginner in dev world, I made mistakes of course and the game was too difficult and unplayable, in short a first game !

I abandoned the project to devote myself to other projects and five years later I decided to do some updates, making it more easy and more friendly user (but I not rebuild all game) in order to be able to share it on itch !

I hope some of you will have fun and do not hesitate to give me your opinion. The game is in French and English
